title: Zhan Yue - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Harem   Martial Arts   Slice of Life   Xuanhuan
tags: Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Demons   Dragons   Game Ranking System   Gamers   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Level System   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Modern Day   Mythical Beasts   Phoenixes   Poor to Rich   Race Change   Skill Books   Special Abilities   Spirits   Sword And Magic   Teamwork   Virtual Reality
author: Shi Luo Ye   失落叶
description:
On the opening day of Illusionary Moon, I realised that I had many more items in my inventory as compared to other players. One Shura Secret Codex, an Achievement Manual and also a really mysterious bracelet.

I didn't know who gave me all these, I also didn't know what triggered the system bug. The only thing I knew was that this was the beginning!

The world will tremble because of me, the mountains and rivers will awaken for me. 700 million girls will be attracted to me, because I might really be the strongest character in this world!>
